definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: There are obvious differences in feldspar content between the north and south sides of the catchment area.
sentences.chinese: 匯水區南北的長石含量存在明顯差異。

sentences.english: The catchment area played a dominant role in determining surface runoff.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，匯水區面積對總產流起決定性作用。
